greeting-p0:
🐵 I'm Madeleine! 😀 
Great to meet you!

I know things might be confusing for you or scary, but I know quite a lot about reproductive health so don't worry! I can help you by answering questions, giving an assessment, or connecting you with local resources! I'm also multi-lingual! What would you like to do?
greeting-p1:
🐵 Great, try asking me a question!
I can answer something like 'What is a STD?'
You can also discover new questions by saying 'Show me random questions!'
Go for it!
greeting-p2: 🐵 Ok! I'm going to ask you a few questions to see what product is best for you. Do you like to exercise during your period?
greeting-p4: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p5: Great! You will be most comfortable going with tampons
greeting-p6: No problem! You will be most comfortable going with pads
